methodology.cost_model_approach: Aggregated 12 months historical data by vehicle type and overall. Calculated total cost per mile per type. Determined cost component percentages based on total 12-month costs.
methodology.forecast_assumptions: Used 12-month averages as baseline. Applied Sheet 4 monthly % changes to baseline costs/rates, adjusting for volume. Assumed Insurance/Depreciation fixed. Used 15% Admin Overhead rule (Sheet 3) for forecast calculations.
